0.text: Innate: Whenever Volibear damages at least one enemy with a basic attack or ability, he generates a stack of The Relentless Storm for 6 seconds, which refreshes on subsequent hits and stacks up to 5 times. At 5 stacks, Volibear gains Lightning Claws.
0.html: Innate: Whenever Volibear damages at least one enemy with a basic attack or ability, he generates a stack of The Relentless Storm for 6 seconds, which refreshes on subsequent hits and stacks up to 5 times. At 5 stacks, Volibear gains Lightning Claws.

1.text: The Relentless Storm: For each stack, Volibear gains  5% (+ 4% per 100 AP) bonus attack speed, up to 25% (+ 20% per 100 AP).
1.html: The Relentless Storm: For each stack, Volibear gains  5% (+ 4% per 100 AP) bonus attack speed, up to 25% (+ 20% per 100 AP).

2.text: Lightning Claws: Volibear's claws ignite with lightning, empowering his basic attacks  on-hit to deal 11 − 60 (based on level) (+ 40% AP) bonus magic damage to the target and the nearest  visible enemy within 450 units of the target, chaining up to 4 subsequent targets.
2.html: Lightning Claws: Volibear's claws ignite with lightning, empowering his basic attacks on-hit to deal 11 − 60 (based on level) (+ 40% AP) bonus magic damage to the target and the nearest visible enemy within 450 units of the target, chaining up to 4 subsequent targets.

0.text: Active: Volibear drops on all fours, becoming  ghosted and gaining  bonus movement speed for 4 seconds, doubled while facing a  visible enemy  champion within 2000 units.
0.html: Active: Volibear drops on all fours, becoming ghosted and gaining  bonus movement speed for 4 seconds, doubled while facing a visible enemy champion within 2000 units.

1.text: During this time, Volibear's next basic attack is empowered to have an  uncancellable windup and  pounce on the target, dealing bonus physical damage and  stunning them for 1 second.
1.html: During this time, Volibear's next basic attack is empowered to have an uncancellable windup and pounce on the target, dealing bonus physical damage and stunning them for 1 second.

2.text: If Volibear becomes  immobilized or  polymorphed by an enemy during Thundering Smash, the effect ends prematurely and the cooldown is  reset.
2.html: If Volibear becomes immobilized or polymorphed by an enemy during Thundering Smash, the effect ends prematurely and the cooldown is  reset.

3.text: Thundering Smash's bonus damage is affected by  critical strike modifiers and applies  life steal at 100% effectiveness.
3.html: Thundering Smash's bonus damage is affected by critical strike modifiers and applies  life steal at 100% effectiveness.

4.text: Thundering Smash  resets Volibear's basic attack timer.
4.html: Thundering Smash resets Volibear's basic attack timer.

0.text: Active: Volibear strikes the target enemy to deal physical damage, apply  on-hit and on-attack effects at 100% effectiveness, and mark them Wounded for 8 seconds.
0.html: Active: Volibear strikes the target enemy to deal physical damage, apply on-hit and on-attack effects at 100% effectiveness, and mark them Wounded for 8 seconds.

1.text: Wounded Bonus: Frenzied Maul deals  50% increased damage and  heals Volibear. The heal is halved against  minions.
1.html: Wounded Bonus: Frenzied Maul deals 50% increased damage and heals Volibear. The heal is halved against minions.

2.text: Frenzied Maul applies  life steal at 100% effectiveness.
2.html: Frenzied Maul applies  life steal at 100% effectiveness.

0.text: Active: Volibear summons a lightning bolt to strike at the target location after a 2-second delay. This can hit Volibear, which  shields him for 14% of his maximum health (+ 75% AP) for 3 seconds.
0.html: Active: Volibear summons a lightning bolt to strike at the target location after a 2-second delay. This can hit Volibear, which shields him for 14% of his maximum health (+ 75% AP) for 3 seconds.

1.text: The bolt deals magic damage to enemies hit, capped at 650 against non-champions,  slows them by 40% for 2 seconds, and grants  sight of the area for 1 second.
1.html: The bolt deals magic damage to enemies hit, capped at 650 against non-champions, slows them by 40% for 2 seconds, and grants sight of the area for 1 second.

0.text: Active: Volibear gains Stormbringer for 12 seconds and  leaps to the target location with  crowd control immunity, granting  sight of the area in a 500 radius during the travel.
0.html: Active: Volibear gains Stormbringer for 12 seconds and leaps to the target location with crowd control immunity, granting sight of the area in a 500 radius during the travel.

1.text: Stormbringer: Volibear gains  ghosting,  bonus health,  50 bonus attack range, 25 increased range on  Frenzied Maul, and 35% increased size.
1.html: Stormbringer: Volibear gains ghosting,  bonus health,  50 bonus attack range, 25 increased range on Frenzied Maul, and 35% increased size.

2.text: Volibear impacts after 1 second,  slowing nearby enemies by 50%, decaying over 1 second. Enemies in the epicenter are also dealt  physical damage.
2.html: Volibear impacts after 1 second, slowing nearby enemies by 50%, decaying over 1 second. Enemies in the epicenter are also dealt physical damage.

3.text: Volibear also disables enemy  turrets in an area for a few seconds, rendering them unable to attack, as well as dealing them the same  physical damage.
3.html: Volibear also disables enemy turrets in an area for a few seconds, rendering them unable to attack, as well as dealing them the same physical damage.

4.text: Stormbringer will cast at max range if cast beyond that.  Thundering Smash's duration will be paused for the  leap.
4.html: Stormbringer will cast at max range if cast beyond that. Thundering Smash's duration will be paused for the leap.

0.text: Innate: Whenever Volibear damages at least one enemy with a basic attack or ability, he generates a stack of The Relentless Storm for 6 seconds, which refreshes on subsequent hits and stacks up to 5 times. At 5 stacks, Volibear gains Lightning Claws.
0.html: Innate: Whenever Volibear damages at least one enemy with a basic attack or ability, he generates a stack of The Relentless Storm for 6 seconds, which refreshes on subsequent hits and stacks up to 5 times. At 5 stacks, Volibear gains Lightning Claws.

1.text: The Relentless Storm: For each stack, Volibear gains  5% (+ 4% per 100 AP) bonus attack speed, up to 25% (+ 20% per 100 AP).
1.html: The Relentless Storm: For each stack, Volibear gains  5% (+ 4% per 100 AP) bonus attack speed, up to 25% (+ 20% per 100 AP).

2.text: Lightning Claws: Volibear's claws ignite with lightning, empowering his basic attacks  on-hit to deal 11 − 60 (based on level) (+ 40% AP) bonus magic damage to the target and the nearest  visible enemy within 450 units of the target, chaining up to 4 subsequent targets.
2.html: Lightning Claws: Volibear's claws ignite with lightning, empowering his basic attacks on-hit to deal 11 − 60 (based on level) (+ 40% AP) bonus magic damage to the target and the nearest visible enemy within 450 units of the target, chaining up to 4 subsequent targets.

0.text: Active: Volibear drops on all fours, becoming  ghosted and gaining  bonus movement speed for 4 seconds, doubled while facing a  visible enemy  champion within 2000 units.
0.html: Active: Volibear drops on all fours, becoming ghosted and gaining  bonus movement speed for 4 seconds, doubled while facing a visible enemy champion within 2000 units.

1.text: During this time, Volibear's next basic attack is empowered to have an  uncancellable windup and  pounce on the target, dealing bonus physical damage and  stunning them for 1 second.

2.text: If Volibear becomes  immobilized or  polymorphed by an enemy during Thundering Smash, the effect ends prematurely and the cooldown is  reset.
2.html: If Volibear becomes immobilized or polymorphed by an enemy during Thundering Smash, the effect ends prematurely and the cooldown is  reset.

3.text: Thundering Smash's bonus damage is affected by  critical strike modifiers and applies  life steal at 100% effectiveness.
3.html: Thundering Smash's bonus damage is affected by critical strike modifiers and applies  life steal at 100% effectiveness.

4.text: Thundering Smash  resets Volibear's basic attack timer.
4.html: Thundering Smash resets Volibear's basic attack timer.

st_flatStats1.concerningText: Active: Volibear drops on all fours, becoming  ghosted and gaining  bonus movement speed for 4 seconds, doubled while facing a  visible enemy  champion within 2000 units.

st_flatStats0.concerningText: Active: Volibear strikes the target enemy to deal physical damage, apply  on-hit and on-attack effects at 100% effectiveness, and mark them Wounded for 8 seconds.

st_flatStats1.concerningText: Active: Volibear strikes the target enemy to deal physical damage, apply  on-hit and on-attack effects at 100% effectiveness, and mark them Wounded for 8 seconds.

st_flatStats0.concerningText: Wounded Bonus: Frenzied Maul deals  50% increased damage and  heals Volibear. The heal is halved against  minions.
The bolt deals magic damage to enemies hit, capped at 650 against non-champions,  slows them by 40% for 2 seconds, and grants  sight of the area for 1 second.
Stormbringer: Volibear gains  ghosting,  bonus health,  50 bonus attack range, 25 increased range on  Frenzied Maul, and 35% increased size.
Volibear also disables enemy  turrets in an area for a few seconds, rendering them unable to attack, as well as dealing them the same  physical damage.
